data.lyric:
[ti:Hand Me Downs]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:30.32]Mac Miller：
[00:33.51]I'm thinkin' maybe I should thank you
[00:37.52]Oh baby I should buy you another round
[00:41.45]'Cause you care and I swear that I'm here but I'm there
[00:44.96]It's getting harder to hunt me down
[00:48.37]Get away to a place where the lakes such a great view
[00:52.18]Leave the bank couple hunnid thou'
[00:55.54]I made it but I hate once I build it I break it down
[00:59.62]Might just break me down
[01:03.58]And all I ever needed was somebody with some reason who can keep me sane
[01:10.42]Ever since I can remember
[01:12.07]I've been keeping it together but I'm feeling strange
[01:16.20]Get away when it ain't really safe and it don't seem right
[01:23.20]But what's new you get used to the bulls**t the screws they go missing
[01:28.72]It's likely they might be but
[01:30.31]Baro Sura：
[01:30.46]You remind me
[01:36.50]S**t I need to stay in line
[01:39.90]You d**n well are a great design
[01:44.57]You despite being an only child
[01:50.24]Say you need more of a family 'round
[01:53.53]Let's turn these genes into hand me downs
[01:57.88]Down down down down down
[02:04.85]Down down down down down
[02:10.98]Mac Miller：
[02:11.32]Yeah well I'm just being honest my conscience ain't doin' bad
[02:15.91]Because I try to minus the problems that I attract
[02:19.28]And half the time the wheels that's in the back of my mind
[02:22.28]Just keep on turning
[02:23.43]'Til the tires flat and burn until the fire crack
[02:26.62]I do not lie though facts may seem a little farfetched
[02:29.83]That's only 'cause I may be make believe and full of darkness
[02:33.04]When I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place
[02:35.93]Walk and drop in change inside your empty guitar case
[02:39.25]That's charity um I move carelessly that's why I'm always tripping
[02:43.68]I guess that's like electrolytes you help me go the distance
[02:47.54]Not too efficient but the way it's always been
[02:50.61]Until the day we have to meet again
[02:53.42]Get away when it ain't really safe and it don't seem right
[03:00.52]But what's new you get used to the bulls**t the screws they go missing
[03:06.03]It's likely they might be but
[03:07.94]Baro Sura：
[03:08.19]You remind me
[03:13.86]S**t I need to stay in line
[03:17.20]You d**n well are a great design
[03:21.79]You despite being an only child
[03:27.58]Say you need more of a family 'round
[03:30.96]Let's turn these genes into hand me downs
[03:35.19]Down down down down down
[03:41.97]Down down down down down
data.trans:
[ti:Hand Me Downs]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.33]//
[00:01.43]//
[00:33.67]我在想 或许我该谢谢你
[00:37.62]宝贝 我该再请你喝一杯
[00:41.39]因为你在乎我 我发誓 我会留在这里
[00:44.05]但我渐行渐远 想找到我 越来越难
[00:48.53]逃到一个湖边 多美的风景
[00:52.12]离开此地 漂泊千里
[00:55.42]我做到了 但这一切又被我毁了
[00:59.12]我或许会因此而崩溃
[01:03.69]我只是需要一个正常人来让我保持理智
[01:10.30]从我记事起 我就一直很正常
[01:13.68]但我现在感觉很奇怪
[01:16.20]感到不安的时候 我就逃之夭夭
[01:18.74]似乎这并不是正确的选择
[01:22.99]不足为奇 你已经习惯了这种事情
[01:26.22]我已经失去了控制
[01:28.90]很可能真是如此
[01:30.69]你提醒了我
[01:36.63]我得遵守规矩
[01:40.10]你真是个天才
[01:44.50]你虽然是个独生子
[01:50.44]却说你需要更多家庭温暖
[01:53.73]让我们将这些品质传承下去
[01:57.73]薪火相传
[02:04.55]薪火相传
[02:11.22]我只是实话实说
[02:13.82]我没有动什么歪心思
[02:16.02]因为我不想造成太多麻烦
[02:19.28]我的脑袋常常是
[02:22.38]不停转动 直到失去动力
[02:24.48]直到化为灰烬
[02:26.63]但我不撒谎 事实可能有点牵强
[02:29.92]那可能是因为我自欺欺人 内心阴暗
[02:32.91]当我陷入两难境地时
[02:36.06]依然会走到你面前 往你空空如也的吉他盒里扔点零钱
[02:39.27]当做慈善
[02:40.80]我做事粗心大意 所以我总是会遇到问题
[02:43.80]我感觉没有自主能力 要靠你推我向前
[02:47.55]效率不高 但一直以来都只能如此
[02:50.63]直到我们再见那天为止
[02:53.72]感到不安的时候 我就逃之夭夭
[02:56.06]似乎这并不是正确的选择
[03:00.39]不足为奇 你已经习惯了这种事情
[03:03.56]我已经失去了控制
[03:06.11]很可能真是如此
[03:08.00]你提醒了我
[03:14.07]我得遵守规矩
[03:17.46]你真是个天才
[03:21.97]你虽然是个独生子
[03:27.81]却说你需要更多家庭温暖
[03:30.89]让我们将这些品质传承下去
[03:35.25]薪火相传
[03:41.93]薪火相传
